name: Benchify
headline: Bug-free code without writing tests
description: Benchify is a code review tool that uncovers real bugs by rigorously testing code using methods typically restricted to rocket science and chip design.

founders.name: Juan Castaño, Founder
founders.description: Juan Castaño is the co-founder and CEO of Benchify. Prior to Benchify, Juan bought and sold a business for 5x MOIC, created MVPs for 9+ clients as a UI/UX designer, devised GTM strategy at Instawork (Series C), initiated a growth product team at Klaviyo (pre-IPO), and advised on due diligence transactions at McKinsey & Company. Juan studied Economics and Human-centered design at Dartmouth and holds an MBA from MIT Sloan.

founders.name: Max von Hippel, Founder
founders.description: Max von Hippel holds a PhD in Computer Science from Northeastern University, focused on security and interactive theorem proving.  Before that, he completed a BS in Pure Mathematics at the University of Arizona.  But most importantly, he holds a Blue Belt from 10th Planet Jiu Jitsu.  Max grew up in Anchorage Alaska and is deeply passionate about software assurance (who isn't?).

# Move faster and break (fewer) things
# Move faster and break (fewer) things
Benchify automates much of the pesky software testing process so you can get back to writing net new code. 
Benchify automates much of the pesky software testing process so you can get back to writing net new code.

Features
## Code reviews done right
Get actionable feedback based on actual test executions.
### [See your code, _logically._ Benchify automatically describes the logical relationships between the inputs and outputs of functions in your code.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kYsq9HpBlbXGjmqNSx6FPKVEwo.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FgbKRedpH8UkciuBrr4RmwTgXE.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CziSDE7NpqqEWsM0WEAlfyNSV4.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [See your code, _logically._ Benchify automatically describes the logical relationships between the inputs and outputs of functions in your code.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kYsq9HpBlbXGjmqNSx6FPKVEwo.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FgbKRedpH8UkciuBrr4RmwTgXE.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CziSDE7NpqqEWsM0WEAlfyNSV4.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [See your code, _logically._ Benchify automatically describes the logical relationships between the inputs and outputs of functions in your code.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kYsq9HpBlbXGjmqNSx6FPKVEwo.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FgbKRedpH8UkciuBrr4RmwTgXE.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CziSDE7NpqqEWsM0WEAlfyNSV4.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Tested patches.When Benchify suggests a patch, it tests it first, so you know the patch is an improvement on the original.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/y6DpeOY1nHFBneQWcBOjoJGfU.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VZMf0dQn1EjyZVYpRyxjyUKubw.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Tested patches.When Benchify suggests a patch, it tests it first, so you know the patch is an improvement on the original.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/y6DpeOY1nHFBneQWcBOjoJGfU.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VZMf0dQn1EjyZVYpRyxjyUKubw.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Tested patches.When Benchify suggests a patch, it tests it first, so you know the patch is an improvement on the original.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/y6DpeOY1nHFBneQWcBOjoJGfU.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VZMf0dQn1EjyZVYpRyxjyUKubw.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Instant code coverage.Benchify translates counterexamples into locally runnable unit tests.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/zvzp9PJOEqAgcpPTfobp6vs5I.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Instant code coverage.Benchify translates counterexamples into locally runnable unit tests.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/zvzp9PJOEqAgcpPTfobp6vs5I.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Instant code coverage.Benchify translates counterexamples into locally runnable unit tests.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/zvzp9PJOEqAgcpPTfobp6vs5I.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Performance analysis.Benchify automatically finds inputs that make your functions slow.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5O9jdtwl0nir1EHJTeUfoFOZGs.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Yb5YcbYxmUPedHwDNDgc62MwF6U.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/S1wwV3nDsC23cOf16fmwMNS9vk.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Performance analysis.Benchify automatically finds inputs that make your functions slow.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5O9jdtwl0nir1EHJTeUfoFOZGs.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Yb5YcbYxmUPedHwDNDgc62MwF6U.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/S1wwV3nDsC23cOf16fmwMNS9vk.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [Performance analysis.Benchify automatically finds inputs that make your functions slow.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5O9jdtwl0nir1EHJTeUfoFOZGs.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Yb5YcbYxmUPedHwDNDgc62MwF6U.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/S1wwV3nDsC23cOf16fmwMNS9vk.png?lossless=1)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [**Get reproducible counterexamples, fast.** Benchify tests your code with strategic inputs and highlights where assertions fail.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Epi0hIpm0KdRNRIP1jT61g9XZdI.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYnhnmk67XC4MC1ykUo4pGMdozA.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [**Get reproducible counterexamples, fast.** Benchify tests your code with strategic inputs and highlights where assertions fail.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Epi0hIpm0KdRNRIP1jT61g9XZdI.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYnhnmk67XC4MC1ykUo4pGMdozA.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
### [**Get reproducible counterexamples, fast.** Benchify tests your code with strategic inputs and highlights where assertions fail.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Epi0hIpm0KdRNRIP1jT61g9XZdI.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYnhnmk67XC4MC1ykUo4pGMdozA.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
Secret Sauce
# Vastly better tests.
# Vastly better tests.
# Vastly better tests.
Analyze your code with the same battle-tested techniques used by NASA, Jane St, Apple Silicon, and AWS.
Analyze your code with the same battle-tested techniques used by NASA, Jane St, Apple Silicon, and AWS.
Analyze your code with the same battle-tested techniques used by NASA, Jane St, Apple Silicon, and AWS.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/uAZ84OYIydNRebCQohHswxGfBS4.svg)
Easy to understand explanations 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/68jZbUpMthZDJvJxowDcRcsCk.svg)
In-depth results in ~1 minute
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/TDWksinUuIbqpU1BiYz0i6RVgE.svg)
High degree of context 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/iSzZUxBBeY9QBxR201NsFYETZeE.svg)
Robust data security measures
### Math-based approach
Unit tests encode single scenarios. We use more robust representations to describe sets of scenarios, tested against dozens of strategically generated inputs.
Unit tests encode single scenarios. We use more robust representations to describe sets of scenarios, tested against dozens of strategically generated inputs.
### Code execution
Benchify actually executes your code, so when it reports a test failure, the failure is real. No more second-guessing hallucinated bug reports.
### All-in-one
Benchify provides you with concrete counterexamples, reproducible unit tests, and patches so you can get back to writing net-new code.
Benchify provides you with concrete counterexamples, reproducible unit tests, and patches so you can get back to writing net-new code.
### Secure by design
Benchify runs your code in an ephemeral container which gets securely deleted post-run. All communication is TLS-encrypted and your account is authenticated using the GitHub API.

### **Get reproducible counterexamples, fast.** Benchify tests your code with strategic inputs and highlights where assertions fail.![⟨13⟩![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYnhnmk67XC4MC1ykUo4pGMdozA.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6bZ0A2PCtBZD7XutwDhJ6XAIMM.svg)](https://www.benchify.com/<./>)
Secret Sauce
# Vastly better tests.
# Vastly better tests.
# Vastly better tests.
Analyze your code with the same battle-tested techniques used by NASA, Jane St, Apple Silicon, and AWS.
Analyze your code with the same battle-tested techniques used by NASA, Jane St, Apple Silicon, and AWS.
Analyze your code with the same battle-tested techniques used by NASA, Jane St, Apple Silicon, and AWS.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/uAZ84OYIydNRebCQohHswxGfBS4.svg)
Easy to understand explanations 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/68jZbUpMthZDJvJxowDcRcsCk.svg)
In-depth results in ~1 minute
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/TDWksinUuIbqpU1BiYz0i6RVgE.svg)
High degree of context 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/iSzZUxBBeY9QBxR201NsFYETZeE.svg)
Robust data security measures
### Math-based approach
Unit tests encode single scenarios. We use more robust representations to describe sets of scenarios, tested against dozens of strategically generated inputs.
Unit tests encode single scenarios. We use more robust representations to describe sets of scenarios, tested against dozens of strategically generated inputs.
### Code execution
Benchify actually executes your code, so when it reports a test failure, the failure is real. No more second-guessing hallucinated bug reports.
### All-in-one
Benchify provides you with concrete counterexamples, reproducible unit tests, and patches so you can get back to writing net-new code.
Benchify provides you with concrete counterexamples, reproducible unit tests, and patches so you can get back to writing net-new code.
### Secure by design
Benchify runs your code in an ephemeral container which gets securely deleted post-run. All communication is TLS-encrypted and your account is authenticated using the GitHub API.

generated_description:
**Meet Benchify: Revolutionizing Code Quality**

Founded in 2024 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Benchify is on a mission to deliver bug-free code—without the need for exhaustive tests. Think of it as a code review tool that goes beyond conventional methods. Benchify rigorously tests your code using advanced techniques typically reserved for rocket science and chip design. It's like having a NASA engineer checking your software.

**Why Benchify?**

At its core, Benchify aims to automate the tedious aspects of software testing. It not only identifies bugs but also suggests improved patches, all while letting you focus on creating new features. In short, it helps you move faster while breaking (fewer) things.

**Key Features:**
- **Logical Code Analysis:** Benchify provides insights into the relationships between input and output in your code, helping you see logical connections clearly.
- **Tested Suggestions:** Any patches Benchify recommends come from its own prior tests, ensuring they're improvements over the original code.
- **Instant Code Coverage:** It translates counterexamples into runnable unit tests, so you know precisely where things might break.
- **Performance Insights:** The tool automatically identifies inputs that may slow down your functions, enabling you to enhance performance effectively.

**Pricing Plans:**  
Benchify offers a range of pricing options:
- **Basic Plan:** Free for solo developers with essential features.
- **Premium Plan:** $50/month, ideal for individual developers focusing on productivity.
- **Business Plan:** $250/month, perfect for teams that need advanced testing and security features.

**The Team and Backing:**  
With a lean team of just two employees, Benchify is also supported by Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne from Y Combinator's Batch S24. It is tagged under developer tools, generative AI, and enterprise software.

**Getting Started:**  
You can dive into Benchify for free and explore how it can transform your coding workflow. Interested developers can join their alpha program [here](https://www.benchify.com/<https:/app.benchify.com/signup>).

To learn more about how Benchify can boost your coding efficiency, visit their website at [Benchify](https://www.benchify.com).
